channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Helping 1,000 small businesses build with AI
item.description: OpenAI is partnering with DoorDash, SCORE, and local organizations to help 1,000 small businesses build with AI. The Small Business AI Jam gives Main Street business owners hands-on tools and training to compete and grow. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/small-business-ai-jam

item.title: Early experiments in accelerating science with GPT-5
item.description: OpenAI introduces the first research cases showing how GPT-5 accelerates scientific progress across math, physics, biology, and computer science. Explore how AI and researchers collaborate to generate proofs, uncover new insights, and reshape the pace of discovery. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/accelerating-science-gpt-5

item.title: Strengthening our safety ecosystem with external testing
item.description: OpenAI works with independent experts to evaluate frontier AI systems. Third-party testing strengthens safety, validates safeguards, and increases transparency in how we assess model capabilities and risks. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/strengthening-safety-with-external-testing

item.title: How evals drive the next chapter in AI for businesses
item.description: Learn how evals help businesses define, measure, and improve AI performance—reducing risk, boosting productivity, and driving strategic advantage. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/evals-drive-next-chapter-of-ai

item.title: OpenAI and Target team up on new AI-powered experiences
item.description: OpenAI and Target are partnering to bring a new Target app to ChatGPT, offering personalized shopping and faster checkout. Target will also expand its use of ChatGPT Enterprise to boost productivity and guest experiences. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/target-partnership

item.title: A free version of ChatGPT built for teachers
item.description: ChatGPT for Teachers is a secure workspace with education‑grade privacy and admin controls. Free for verified U.S. K–12 educators through June 2027. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/chatgpt-for-teachers

item.title: Building more with GPT-5.1-Codex-Max
item.description: Introducing GPT-5.1-Codex-Max, a faster, more intelligent agentic coding model for Codex. The model is designed for long-running, project-scale work with enhanced reasoning and token efficiency. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-1-codex-max

item.title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max System Card
item.description: This system card outlines the comprehensive safety measures implemented for GPT‑5.1-CodexMax. It details both model-level mitigations, such as specialized safety training for harmful tasks and prompt injections, and product-level mitigations like agent sandboxing and configurable network access. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-1-codex-max-system-card

item.title: Teacher Access Terms
item.description: Teacher Access Terms outline how verified educators may use ChatGPT for Teachers, covering eligibility, account management, and data privacy requirements. Link to article: https://openai.com/policies/education-terms

item.title: Intuit and OpenAI join forces on new AI-powered experiences
item.description: OpenAI and Intuit have entered a $100M+ multi-year partnership to launch Intuit app experiences in ChatGPT and expand Intuit’s use of OpenAI’s frontier models to power personalized financial tools. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/intuit-partnership

item.title: OpenAI named Emerging Leader in Generative AI
item.description: OpenAI has been named an Emerging Leader in Gartner’s 2025 Innovation Guide for Generative AI Model Providers. The recognition reflects our enterprise momentum, with over 1 million companies building with ChatGPT. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gartner-2025-emerging-leader

item.title: Introducing OpenAI for Ireland
item.description: OpenAI launches OpenAI for Ireland, partnering with the Irish Government, Dogpatch Labs and Patch to help SMEs, founders and young builders use AI to innovate, boost productivity and build the next generation of Irish tech startups. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-for-ireland

item.title: Understanding neural networks through sparse circuits
item.description: OpenAI is exploring mechanistic interpretability to understand how neural networks reason. Our new sparse model approach could make AI systems more transparent and support safer, more reliable behavior. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/understanding-neural-networks-through-sparse-circuits

item.title: How Philips Is scaling AI literacy across 70,000 employees
item.description: Philips is scaling AI literacy with ChatGPT Enterprise, training 70,000 employees to use AI responsibly and improve healthcare outcomes worldwide. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/philips

item.title: Introducing GPT-5.1 for developers
item.description: GPT-5.1 is now available in the API, bringing faster adaptive reasoning, extended prompt caching, improved coding performance, and new apply_patch and shell tools. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-1-for-developers
